Dear {!Contact.Name},
In accordance to Resolution 851.11 (CASS Export) and 853.11 (CASS Import) a Member, Airline, GSSA or CASS Delivering Company may withdraw from a given CASS by serving written notice of not less than three (3) months and shall be liable for its share of all costs through the end of the notice period.
Exception: a GSSA’s participation in a CASS may be terminated when the Participant appointing the GSSA has notified the Agency Administrator, in accordance to Resolution 871, with not less than three calendar months’ notice in writing that they have terminated their appointment of the GSA.
Therefore, to process your request please forward us an official notification of intention to withdraw from the CASS.
You can use the attached template letter for your reference. The notification must:
· Be on an official company letterhead
· Signed by a designated signatory
· State the termination date
The original document must be sent to:
International Air Transport Association
Airline Participation 33, Route de l’Aeroport P.O. Box 416 1215 Geneva 15 Airport, Switzerland
Please do not hesitate to contact this office in case of any further queries/assistance that may be required with regards to the above. Our team will be glad to assist you accordingly.
For future support in regards to any other query, please log a new inquiry through our customer portal at http://www.iata.org/customer-portal/Pages/contactus.aspx
Annex: Template Letter for Withdrawal
Thank you !
